reviewText: As a coach of many years I found the tape quite interesting.  The adoration shown for Maradona by the Napoli fans was interesting and understandable considering the genius that Maradone was at this time.  I thought the emphasis placed by Napoli trainers on Maradona's explosiveness and speed was revealing.  The great fitness he brought into the WC in 1986 ,in my opinion, set the stage for his spectacular showing there.
